page.title: 01General Review of the Block
page.content: This is a mainly agricultural area. The mainn types of farming being :- dairy, beef cattle and sheep, some grazing the hills. There are nine farms in the block, four of which are chiefly dairy farms. {Occupations}Apart from farm work, some people work in a factory in Dalbeattie making radiators for home heating. Others are employed in the local tourist industry. There are also a number of retired and un-employed people. {Physical Aspects}On the north of the block is a ridge the height of which varies from 800 to almost 2000 feet. {Education}There is a two teacher Primary School in the block, the present roll is 25 children. {Population}There are approximately 300 people living in the block.
